commit.message:
8345173

Hi all,

  please review this small change that adds a missing `ResourceMark` to `BlockLocationPrinter`; it can be called at very arbitrary places (e.g. the stop() method of MacroAssembler), and without this change it might fail with a "Missing ResourceMark error - possible memory leak" error instead of providing the stop() output.

Testing: local testing, after the change the ResourceMark crash goes away, gha

Thanks,
  Thomas
